entry.title: Thursday: Chance of showers. High 21. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of showers in the afternoon with risk of a thunderstorm. Wind becoming southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 in the afternoon. High 21. UV index 5 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 27 April 2016

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of showers. Low plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of showers in the evening and risk of thunderstorms. Clearing overnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light after midnight. Low plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Wednesday 27 April 2016
